biotools.summary: Combinatorial and Semantic Analysis of Functional Elements (CombSAFE). It is a flexible computational method to identify combinations of static and dynamic functional elements genome-wide, or in a specific genomic region, and how they change across semantically annotated biological conditions.

bioschemas.name: CombSAFE
bioschemas.summary: Combinatorial and Semantic Analysis of Functional Elements (CombSAFE).
